fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Isolate a target, making all abilities targeting them fail tonight.
- Isolate yourself tonight, making all abilities targeting you fail tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You bypass roleblock immunity.
- Roleblock immune
- Redirect immune
- You cannot isolate yourself consecutive nights.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to the end of the game.
